NotFound.message: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

Status.connectionError: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection or try again later.

Login.userNotFound: We couldn't find an account with the provided details. Please check your email or username and try again.
Login.passwordIncorrect: The password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
Login.accountLocked: Account locked due to too many failed login attempts. Reset your password or contact support.
Login.loginFailed: There was an error logging in. Please try again later.

Register.name: Name
Register.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
Register.passwordUppercase: Password must include at least one uppercase letter.
Register.passwordNumber: Password must include at least one number.
Register.passwordSpecial: Password must include at least one special character (e.g. !, @, #, etc.).
Register.userAlreadyExists: An account with this email already exists. Please log in or use a different email.
Register.passwordRequirementsNotMet: The password does not meet the required criteria. Ensure it contains at least one uppercase letter, one number, and a minimum of 8 characters.
Register.invalidEmail: The email address you entered is not valid. Please ensure it is correctly formatted (e.g., example@domain.com).
Register.invalidName: Name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, or apostrophes.
Register.registrationFailed: There was an error logging in. Please try again later.

OrderItem.ez_barbell_description: Curved barbell for arm workouts. Perfect for biceps and triceps.
OrderItem.dumbbells_set_description: A collection of free weights that allow you to perform a variety of strength exercises.
OrderItem.kettlebell_description: An ideal fitness tool for building strength, improving functional movement, and enhancing performance.
OrderItem.triceps_row_description: A fitness attachment crafted from a durable, variable-length rope, designed for versatile training and enhanced performance.
OrderItem.angle_bar_description: A versatile fitness tool, typically attached to a cable machine.
OrderItem.lat_machine_bar_description: The lat machine bar is an essential fitness tool for those looking to train their back.
OrderItem.pull_up_bar_description: The pull-up bar is a fitness tool consisting of a horizontal bar fixed to a support.
OrderItem.jumping_rope_description: Consists of a rope with handles that is rotated under the feet.
OrderItem.weight_disc_description: Metal or rubber cylinders with a central hole that allows them to be attached to barbells.
OrderItem.creatine_description: Creatine is a natural compound that helps increase energy during high-intensity activities, improving strength, power, and muscle growth.
